answers.answer: I'm 18,weeks tomorrow and I had gained 4 pounds but then I lost it so I'm even. All due to morning sickness but they say u should gain 25-30 pounds during the whole pregnancy. :)

Before I found out I was pregnant i admit i eat alot. I figure because I had a miscarriage on oct n well I eat my feelings lol I had gain like 13 pounds but dude to morning sickness I lost it all the dr has told me I have the pregnancy diabetes so am a little confused. .
Just depends if you were heavy or not. I'm 15 weeks and lost weight and the doctor said is because I have extra tissue(chubby).

question: When is it normal to start gaining weight am 16 going for 17 weeks tomorrow and it seems like am losing the weight instead of gaining. . 1st trimester I hardly eat due to morning sickness. Now During the 2nd am Eating  Because am Hungry or am craving it.. but I feel like I been Eating alot to the point that I should of gain something by now!  Ftm. Oh n I have g.diabetes
title: weight gain
